meta.job_title: AI Integration and Prompt Engineering Specialist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the transition of human-run education services to be fully automated through the power of generative AI.
Utilize tools like OpenAI Code Interpreter, LangChain, and AWS Glue to revolutionize educational services.
Design AI prompts based on the breakdown of complex cases and understanding of learning science.
Thoroughly check and validate IDSs to ensure AI solutions are delivering top-notch services.
Evaluate outputs, build prototypes, and push the quality bar higher.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in AI, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
